ENGINEERING LAB TECHNICIAN

SUMMARY

To obtain a position in my field of Electronics with a company that offers opportunities for advancement based on strong technical skills and work performance.

Construct, test and troubleshoot AC/DC circuits Determine voltage, current, resistance and power by calculations and measurements Identify electronic components and schematic symbols Utilize oscilloscopes to measure AC frequency Very proficient in soldering Troubleshoot and identify faulty capacitors, inductors and transformers Skilled in the use of hand tools for repairing and installing electronics Create circuits with Multisim CAD software Assemble/disassemble PCs and electronics to the component level Familiar in C+, C++, Java script, SQL, Visual Studio, Microsoft Team Foundation, Microsoft Test Manager, Tera Term, GShell, Linux, OSi Studied and understand Programmable Logic controllers Digital communications with fiber optics Understand different types of transmission lines: twisted pair, UTP, shielded pair and coaxial Proficient with Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Access, Outlook Strong oral and written communication skills Adapt to new technology at an accelerated rate

<JD_START>
Job Title: Test Engineer

Location: Mount Pleasant, PA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
NEW LABVIEW TEST ENGINEERING OPPORTUNITY SUPPORTING THE DEVELOPMENT OF NEXT GENERATION PRODUCTS IN A R&D SETTING!!!**

Job Description

Provide test engineering for facility. Support Test Engineering function by providing guidance and support to other test engineers. Troubleshoot test fixtures, software, and procedures.

Perform analysis, diagnostics and preliminary evaluations of products; develop testing procedures and fixtures as requiredDevelop test procedures, equipment and fixturing design responsibilitiesAnalyze customer requirements and develop testing proceduresRepair and maintenance of test fixturesInstall test software, programming software and repair test PCsRepairing and troubleshooting test PCsAssist Production with test needs and troubleshooting PCA down to the componentWork on and set up Engineering VLAN

Job Skills & Qualifications

Bachelor's degree in related technical field Minimum 5 years of progressive relevant job experience Previous experience with technical writingPrevious experience with PC hardware, OS system, and installing and working with test softwareAdvanced ability to read schematics and wiring diagramsIntermediate ability in schematic capture and electrical designIntermediate knowledge of mechanical systemsAdvanced knowledge of analog and digital electronic circuits and theoryAdvanced knowledge using electronic test equipment such as oscilloscopes, spectrum analyzer, 4wire LCR meters etc.Advanced ability to troubleshoot down to the component level for both analog, digital, and embedded circuits/systems.Proficient with Solid Works, AutoCAD and/or other drafting applicationsKnowledge of LAN/WAN networking technologies, including Ethernet and TCP/IPAdvanced technical writing and documentation skillsAbility to read and interpret engineering drawingsAbility to troubleshoot PC hardwareSoldering skills, rework with through hole and SMT components Ability to build prototypes and wire systemsIntermediate level in MS Office applications (Word,Excel, and Outlook)Ability to effectively communicate in all forms with others inside and outside the organizationAbility to provide solutions to complex problemsAbility including ability to plan, resolve problems effectively, and establish prioritiesAbility to work with a high level of accuracy and attention to detail to produce quality resultsAbility to multitask efficiently and adapt within a rapidly changing environment

About Actalent

Actalent is a global leader in engineering and sciences services and talent solutions. We help visionary companies advance their engineering and science initiatives through access to specialized experts who drive scale, innovation and speed to market. With a network of almost 30,000 consultants and more than 4,500 clients across the U.S., Canada, Asia and Europe, Actalent serves many of the Fortune 500.

Diversity, Equity & Inclusion

At Actalent, Diversity And Inclusion Are a Bridge Towards The Equity And Success Of Our People. DE&I Are Embedded Into Our Culture Through

Hiring diverse talentMaintaining an inclusive environment through persistent self-reflectionBuilding a culture of care, engagement, and recognition with clear outcomesEnsuring growth opportunities for our people

The company is an equal opportunity employer and will consider all applications without regard to race, sex, age, color, religion, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information or any characteristic protected by law.

If you would like to request a reasonable accommodation, such as the modification or adjustment of the job application process or interviewing process due to a disability, please email actalentaccommodation@actalentservices.com for other accommodation options.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
<JD_END>
